00002 #include "types.h"
00003 #include "armVIC.h"

00005 uint8_t           modem_nb_ovrn;
00006 uint8_t           tx_head;
00007 volatile uint8_t  tx_tail;
00008 uint8_t           tx_buf[ TX_BUF_SIZE ];
00009 uint8_t ck_a, ck_b;
00010 uint8_t tx_byte;
00011 uint8_t tx_bit_idx;
00012 
00013 
00014 #define NB_STATE 2
00015 #define NB_PHASE 2
00016 
00017 static const uint16_t modem_sample[NB_STATE][NB_PHASE][SAMPLES_PER_PERIOD] =
00018   {
00019     {{512, 1023, 512, 1},
00020      {512 ,1 , 512 , 1023}},
00021     {{512, 874, 1023, 874},
00022      {512 ,150 ,1 , 150}}
00023   };
00024 
00025 static uint8_t modem_sample_idx = 0;
00026 static uint8_t modem_phase = 0;
00027 
00028 
00029 static inline uint8_t get_next_bit( void ) {
00030   uint8_t ret;
00031   /*  start bit         */
00032   if (tx_bit_idx == 0)
00033     ret = 0;
00034   /*  data bits         */
00035   else if (tx_bit_idx < 9) {
00036     ret = tx_byte & 0x01;
00037     tx_byte >>= 1;
00038   }
00039   /* stop_bit           */
00040   else {
00041     ret = 1;
00042   }
00043   tx_bit_idx++;
00044 
00045   if (tx_bit_idx >= 10) {
00046     /*  if we have nothing left to transmit */
00047     if( tx_head == tx_tail ) {
00048       /* hack to stay with data = 1            */
00049       tx_bit_idx--;
00050     } else {
00051       /* else load next byte                  */
00052       tx_byte = tx_buf[tx_tail];
00053       tx_bit_idx = 0;
00054       tx_tail++;
00055       if( tx_tail >= TX_BUF_SIZE )
00056   tx_tail = 0;
00057     }
00058   }
00059   return ret;
00060 }
00061 
00062 void TIMER1_ISR ( void ) {
00063   ISR_ENTRY();
00064   static uint8_t modem_bit;
00065 
00066   DACR = modem_sample[modem_bit][modem_phase][modem_sample_idx] << 6;
00067   modem_sample_idx++;
00068   if (modem_sample_idx == SAMPLES_PER_PERIOD) {
00069     modem_sample_idx = 0;
00070     modem_phase ^= modem_bit;
00071     modem_bit =  get_next_bit();
00072   }
00073 
00074   /* clear interrupt */
00075   T1IR = TIR_MR0I;
00076   VICVectAddr = 0x00000000;
00077   ISR_EXIT();
00078 }
